resources.string: There is some connectivity issue. Please check your network connection and try again or call us at the customer service number listed on your debit card.
Unexpected error encountered. Please try again later or call us at the customer service number listed on your debit card.
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later or call us at the customer service number listed on your debit card.
The server is currently down. Please try again later or call us at the customer service number listed on your debit card.
